2.「うおー！ 調理ギルドの人 ありがとう！| オイラ 今 ケガして歩けなくって|:
Whoo! Thank you from the cooking guild! I|can't walk right now because of my injury, so|that's the only thing I was looking forward|
|to!

4.「オレ様にも ひとくち 食わせてみろよ！: Why don't you let me have a piece of that?

5.「あめェな……砂糖菓子のようにあめェ。: It's so sweet. Like a sugar candy...

6.「こんな ふぬけた料理がよッ | 調理のチカラだと 思っていやがるんなら| アン: If you think this kind of stupid cooking is|the power of cooking, you're a real scorpion!

7.「なあ そこのプクリポさんよォ！| もしも 料理で アンタのケガが治るとしたら|: Hey, Mr. Pucuripo! If cooking could heal your|wound, wouldn't you want to eat it right|away?

8.「えっ えっ オイラ？| そりゃあ ケガが治るんなら食べたいけど……。: What, what, me? Well, I'd like to eat it if|it'll heal me, but...

9.「さあ フニャフニャ料理に| デビルパウダーを かけてやったぜェ……！| これを: Now I've sprinkled some devil powder on your|squishy food... Take a bite out of this!

11.「あれ？ なんだこりゃっ？| ケガの痛みが なくなってくぞ！: What the hell? What the hell is this? The|pain from my injury is disappearing!

13.「これが 調理の本当のチカラだぜェ……。| 愛情だの まごころだの言ってる| の: This is the true power of cooking...|Stretched udon noodlers who talk about "love"|and "sincerity" have no right to cook!

14.「よォ！ そこの ひよっこ調理職人。 | 調理の本質は 食べた者を 変えちまうよ: Hey! Hey, chick... The essence of cooking is|a wild and spicy power that can change|whoever eats it, you know?

15.「その魅力に あんたも気づいたのなら | オレ様のもとに 来るがいいぜ。| いつ: If you find that attractive, you can come to|me. You're always welcome here.
